result.execSummary:
The defendant Jose Alfredo Martinez Ramirez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The cash bond shall be applied towards the fine and costs and the balance shall be paid on April 10, 2017.
Defendant shall submit to a DNA sample at the Taylor County Sheriff's Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose Alfredo Martinez Ramirez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jose Alfredo Martinez Ramirez in court.  Kristi S. Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn in Spanish Interpreter.  Plea agreement put into the record.  Victims rights have been complie with.  Defendant freely and voluntarily waives right to an attorney.  Plea of guilty.  Plea colloquy.  Plea freely, voluntarily and intelligently; factual basis exists.  Court finds defendant guilty and orders $100.00 fine plus costs; DNA sample and surcharge.  The fine and costs are to be paid today.  Bond of $500.00 to be applied.  - rt
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 10, 2017 at 10:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 4, 2017 at 03:00 pm.
Order for Appearance at Settlement Conference; Report to Court on Results of Settlement Conference.

Defendant Jose Alfredo Martinez Ramirez in court.  Kristi Tlusty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court swears in Spanish Interpreter.  Court advises defendant of charges and penalties.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.   Court enters a plea of not guilty on defendant's behalf.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 28, 2017 at 10:30 am.  - rt

*Defendant shall not leave the State of Wisconsin without prior notice to and written approval of the Court.  Must report to the Taylor County Sheriff's Office for Booking Procedure.  Defendant shall have no contact with I.V.-Z. - dob: 1-9-87.
Initial appearance scheduled December 27, 2016 at 1:00 p.m.

ADR began at 11:08:27 am.  Attorney Kristi Tlusty appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Jose Alfredo martinez Ramirez appears in person, in custody.  Court swears in Spanish interpreter.  Court finds probable cause for arrest without warrant based on the arrest header.  Attorney Tlusty requests a $500.00 cash bond; booking and no contact with I.V-Z. - dob:  1-9-87.  Statement by defendant.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Court orders bond as requested by Attorney Tlusty.  Next court date is December 27, 2016 at 1:00 pm.  ADR ended at 11:14am.  - rt
